import React from "react"; export default function JDResultCard({ result, onReset }) { const getScoreColor = (score) => { if (score >= 80) return "text-success"; if (score >= 60) return "text-warning"; return "text-danger"; }; const jdAnalysis = result.jd_analysis || {}; const jobInfo = result.job_description || {}; const formatSkills = (skills) => { if (!skills || !Array.isArray(skills)) return []; return skills.slice(0, 15); }; return (
{/* Job Analysis Header - Shows only role/title */} {jobInfo.job_title && jobInfo.job_title !== "Unknown Position" && (

Role Analysis

Position: {jobInfo.job_title} {jobInfo.required_experience > 0 && ( Experience Required: {jobInfo.required_experience}+ years )}

)} {/* Overall Score */}

Overall Match Score

{jdAnalysis.overall_score}/100

How well your resume matches the {jobInfo.job_title || "target role"}

{/* Skills Analysis */}
{/* Matching Skills */}
✅ Matching Skills ({jdAnalysis.matching_skills?.length || 0})

Skills you have that match the role requirements:

{formatSkills(jdAnalysis.matching_skills || []).map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))} {jdAnalysis.matching_skills && jdAnalysis.matching_skills.length > 15 && ( +{jdAnalysis.matching_skills.length - 15} more )}
{/* Missing Skills */}
❌ Skills to Develop ({jdAnalysis.missing_skills?.length || 0})

Skills required for this role that need improvement:

{formatSkills(jdAnalysis.missing_skills || []).map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))} {jdAnalysis.missing_skills && jdAnalysis.missing_skills.length > 15 && ( +{jdAnalysis.missing_skills.length - 15} more )}
{/* Detailed Breakdown */}
Match Breakdown for {jobInfo.job_title || "Target Role"}
{[ { label: "Skills Match", value: jdAnalysis.skill_match, color: "success", description: "How well your technical skills match the role requirements" }, { label: "Experience Match", value: jdAnalysis.experience_match, color: "info", description: "How your experience level compares to what's required" }, { label: "Education Match", value: jdAnalysis.education_match, color: "warning", description: "How your education aligns with the role requirements" }, { label: "Keyword Relevance", value: jdAnalysis.keyword_match, color: "primary", description: "How well your resume content matches the job description keywords" } ].map((item, index) => (
{item.label} {item.description}
{item.value}%
))}
{/* Experience & Education Summary */}
{/* Experience Summary */}
Experience Comparison
Your experience: {result.experience || 0} years | Required: {jobInfo.required_experience || "Not specified"} years
{/* Education Summary */}
Education Alignment
{jdAnalysis.education_match >= 50 ? "✅ Education requirements met" : "⚠️ Review education requirements"}
{/* Recommendations */}
Recommendations for {jobInfo.job_title || "This Role"}
  • 💡 Focus on skill development: Prioritize learning the missing skills highlighted above
  • 💡 Tailor your resume: Add relevant keywords from the job description
  • 💡 Highlight achievements: Emphasize results and impact in your experience section
    • {jdAnalysis.experience_match < 70 && (
  • 💡 Gain more experience: Consider roles or projects that build relevant experience
    • )}
{/* Action Buttons */}
); }
